Articles.Content: I tried to update KSP from the website because the update button on my launcher is not there, but when I log into my account, I go to "My account" but KSP is not in the "Purchased products" list! Which means I have to pay to get the game! Please help, I really don't feel like paying for something I already own! Please help!
Hi @Alex Vovk, we do not have any access to accounts here on the forums, please contact Squad at [email protected] for assistance.
